Recommended for sites that update a few: Recommended for sites that update a few times a month or less like porfolios or brochure sites.
Boost speed and performance by storing a: Boost speed and performance by storing a copy of your website content, files, and images online so the pages of your website load faster for your visitors.
We automatically clear your cache as you: We automatically clear your cache as you work (creating content, changing settings, installing plugins and more). But you can manually clear it here to be confident it's fresh.
Asks the browser to download and cache l: Asks the browser to download and cache links on the page ahead of them being clicked on, so that when they are clicked they load almost instantly.
Prefetch on Mouse Down: Starts loading t: Prefetch on Mouse Down: Starts loading the page as soon as you click down, for faster response when you release the click.
Prefetch on Mouse Hover: Begins loading: Prefetch on Mouse Hover: Begins loading the page the moment your cursor hovers over a link
Prefetch on Touchstart: Instantly starts: Prefetch on Touchstart: Instantly starts loading the page as soon as you tap the screen, ensuring a quicker response when you lift your finger.
Prefetch Above the Fold: Loads links in: Prefetch Above the Fold: Loads links in your current view instantly, ensuring they're ready when you need them.
Exclude Keywords: A comma separated list: Exclude Keywords: A comma separated list of words or strings that will exclude a link from being prefetched. For example, excluding "app" will prevent https://example.com/apple from being prefetched.
Additional speed and scalability feature: Additional speed and scalability features powered by Jetpack Boost to make your site as fast as it can be.
Move important styling information to th: Move important styling information to the start of the page, which helps pages display your content sooner, so your users don’t have to wait for the entire page to load.

Move important styling information to the start of the page, which helps pages display your content sooner, so your users don’t have to wait for the entire page to load.%1$s %2$sBoost will automatically generate your Critical CSS%3$s whenever you make changes to the HTML or CSS structure of your site.
Run non-essential JavaScript after the p: Run non-essential JavaScript after the page has loaded so that styles and images can load more quickly.
Scripts are grouped by their original pl: Scripts are grouped by their original placement, concatenated and minified to reduce site loading time and reduce the number of requests.
Styles are grouped by their original pla: Styles are grouped by their original placement, concatenated and minified to reduce site loading time and reduce the number of requests.
We automatically optimize your uploaded: We automatically optimize your uploaded images to WebP format for faster performance and reduced file sizes. You can also choose to delete the original images to save storage space.
Enable or disable image optimization glo: Enable or disable image optimization globally.
When enabled, all your new image uploads: When enabled, all your new image uploads will be automatically optimized to WebP format, ensuring faster page loading and reduced file sizes.
When enabled, the original uploaded imag: When enabled, the original uploaded image is deleted and replaced with the optimized version, helping to save storage space. If disabled, the optimized image is saved as a separate file, retaining the original.
Your image optimization settings have be: Your image optimization settings have been saved.
Lazy loading defers the loading of image: Lazy loading defers the loading of images until they are visible on the screen, improving page load speed and performance.
Oops! There was an error updating the la: Oops! There was an error updating the lazy loading settings.
When enabled, allows bulk optimization o: When enabled, allows bulk optimization of images in the media library.
When enabled, optimized images will be s: When enabled, optimized images will be served in place of original images when they exist, improving performance.
